plot: This is the story of the Osmond Family and is based on the book written by Olive (Mother) Osmond. This film tells of the beginnings of this family and how they got to where they were by the late '70's.
title: Side by Side: The True Story of the Osmond Family
plot_es: This is the story of the Osmond Family and is based on the book written by Olive (Mother) Osmond. This film tells of the beginnings of this family and how they got to where they were by the late '70's.
original_name: Side by Side: The True Story of the Osmond Family
